text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActRelationshipCheckpoint where concept is-a B

name: ActRelationshipCheckpointBeginning
title: ActRelationshipCheckpointBeginning
description: Condition is tested every time before execution of the service (WHILE condition DO service).
